name: templatesell/springy
description: A perfect theme for blog and Elementor site. This theme is built based on customizer. Besides that, this theme has added custom widgets. Springy is compatible with Master Addons elementor plugin. Futhermore, it has awesome header part, slider section, promotional boxes, related posts and many more. In addition to that, Springy has copyright text, meta option, sidebar option, pagination types etc. Demos: https://www.templatesell.net/demo/springy/
license: GNU General Public License v2 or later

scripts-description.phpcs: Analyze code against the WordPress coding standard with PHP_CodeSniffer
scripts-description.phpcbf: Fix coding standards warnings/errors automatically with PHP Code Beautifier
